name: Captain Gazman: Day Of The Rage
name_original: Captain Gazman: Day Of The Rage
description:
From the creators of December 24th!

The year is 1992 in an unnamed country of former socialism. Mafia clan Nilgor is looking for a new driver.

However, after a short time in a new place, he finds himself between hammer and anvil -

embroiled in a large-scale war between the Nilgor and Gares clans.

Take control of Kayla or Captain Gazman and take part in the biggest crime showdown of those years!

Peculiarities:

-2 playable characters

-15 big and cool levels

-advanced weapon upgrade system

-close combat as an alternative to firearms

-movie-level cutscenes

-full voice acting in two languages

-soundtrack in the form of previously unreleased hits from unknown bands
